remarks: Change bound variables in a wff substitution.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 19-Sep-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
statement:
cbvsbc.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbvsbc.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvsbc.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvsbc $p |- ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> [. A / y ]. ps ) $.
